formatted_address: 13, Jln Niaga Aspira 1/3, Kampung Tiram, 79200 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: NZ FAM BARBEQUE & STEAMBOAT

reviews.text:
I had a great experience at this shop! One of the Chinese cashiers was extremely helpful, and all the staff were very friendly and welcoming. The most important thing the shop is super clean, which I really appreciate!

Also, one staff member even said my wife looks like an Indonesian artist, hahaha such a funny and sweet moment! Thank you for the excellent service. Keep up the great work!

Workers are friendly and helpful. One worker offered to mix a sauce for me, it tastes good compared to the sauce I make myself. Will come back again for the sake of him mixing a delicious sauce for me ðŸ˜‚
The sliced beef is quite tough... The prawns are very fresh.

Went on weekend at 9pm, alot of free parkings, restaurant was already alot of people so it's best to book before you come. We were lucky there were available spots since we only came for 2 pax.

The table is spacious, clean space, alot of people but you can still move around. Staffs are very friendly, gave us a quick explanation on how to order (since it's our first time) and even offered to change the oil sheet when it's already burnt.

You can order their slices through QR code or just take the unlimited marinated meat/chicken/fish at the freezer. There's also cordial and boxed drinks. Some malay dishes too, kuihs and ICE CREAM STICKS LOVE IT

TBH, I don't know if it was unfortunate for us or what but the sliced beef are so chewy :// even if we grilled/boiled it to well done or medium rare, it is still chewy and tasteless. But the marinated meats are very nice tho. Maybe this is something the restaurant can look into..

Other than that, we enjoyed the meal overall.
A very cozy dining experience that will be worth your money. They have variety of options for food and drink. Cutleries and seating area was nicely organised. The place is also very clean. Kudos!

Good place for iftar. Delicious food and a calm environment for the family. The staff is great and ready to help customers anytime. Love the fact that the staff always changes the grill paper. Would recommend to friends and family. 10/10

vicinity: 13, Jalan Niaga Aspira 1/3, Kampung Tiram, Iskandar Puteri
